mapper.insert: insert into memberContent_tb (memberContent_memberId, memberContent_documentId, memberContent_memberPosition) values (#{memberId}, #{documentId}, #{memberPosition})
mapper.select: select memberContent_memberId memberId, memberContent_documentId documentId, memberContent_memberPosition memberPosition from memberContent_tb
mapper.delete: delete from memberContent_tb where memberContent_memberId=#{memberId} and memberContent_documentId=#{documentId}
